name: Great Harvest Crown Point - Daily Analytics Email

parameters.query:
SET timezone = 'America/Chicago';

-- Query 1: Main Analytics Dashboard
WITH date_ranges AS (
    SELECT 
        CURRENT_DATE AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago' as today,
        DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date as week_start,
        DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date as month_start,
        DATE_TRUNC('year', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date as year_start,
        (CURRENT_DATE AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') - INTERVAL '1 day' as yesterday
),
rating_metrics AS (
    SELECT
        COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE(created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') = (SELECT today FROM date_ranges) THEN 1 END) as surveys_today,
        AVG(CASE WHEN DATE(created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') = (SELECT today FROM date_ranges) THEN rating END) as avg_rating_today,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE(created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') = (SELECT today FROM date_ranges) AND rating <= 2 THEN 1 END) as negative_today,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN (created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= (SELECT week_start FROM date_ranges) THEN 1 END) as surveys_wtd,
        AVG(CASE WHEN (created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= (SELECT week_start FROM date_ranges) THEN rating END) as avg_rating_wtd,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN (created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= (SELECT week_start FROM date_ranges) AND rating >= 4 THEN 1 END) as positive_wtd,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN (created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= (SELECT month_start FROM date_ranges) THEN 1 END) as surveys_mtd,
        AVG(CASE WHEN (created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= (SELECT month_start FROM date_ranges) THEN rating END) as avg_rating_mtd,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN (created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= (SELECT month_start FROM date_ranges) AND rating >= 4 THEN 1 END) as positive_mtd,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN (created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= (SELECT year_start FROM date_ranges) THEN 1 END) as surveys_ytd,
        AVG(CASE WHEN (created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= (SELECT year_start FROM date_ranges) THEN rating END) as avg_rating_ytd,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN (created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= (SELECT year_start FROM date_ranges) AND rating >= 4 THEN 1 END) as positive_ytd,
        AVG(CASE WHEN DATE(created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') = (SELECT yesterday FROM date_ranges) THEN rating END) as avg_rating_yesterday,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN (created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= (SELECT week_start FROM date_ranges) AND rating <= 2 AND has_response = true THEN 1 END) as negative_responded_wtd,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN (created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= (SELECT week_start FROM date_ranges) AND rating <= 2 THEN 1 END) as negative_total_wtd
    FROM surveys
    WHERE rating IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT 
    surveys_today,
    ROUND(avg_rating_today::numeric, 2) as avg_rating_today,
    negative_today,
    surveys_wtd,
    ROUND(avg_rating_wtd::numeric, 2) as avg_rating_wtd,
    ROUND(100.0 * positive_wtd / NULLIF(surveys_wtd, 0), 1) as positive_pct_wtd,
    surveys_mtd,
    ROUND(avg_rating_mtd::numeric, 2) as avg_rating_mtd,
    ROUND(100.0 * positive_mtd / NULLIF(surveys_mtd, 0), 1) as positive_pct_mtd,
    surveys_ytd,
    ROUND(avg_rating_ytd::numeric, 2) as avg_rating_ytd,
    ROUND(100.0 * positive_ytd / NULLIF(surveys_ytd, 0), 1) as positive_pct_ytd,
    ROUND(avg_rating_yesterday::numeric, 2) as avg_rating_yesterday,
    ROUND(100.0 * negative_responded_wtd / NULLIF(negative_total_wtd, 0), 1) as negative_response_rate
FROM rating_metrics;

-- Query 2: Top Keywords (Positive)
WITH positive_feedback AS (
    SELECT 
        LOWER(s.feedback) as feedback,
        CASE 
            WHEN (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date THEN 'This Week'
            WHEN (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date THEN 'This Month'
        END as period
    FROM surveys s
    WHERE s.rating >= 4 
    AND s.feedback IS NOT NULL 
    AND LENGTH(s.feedback) > 10
    AND (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date
),
word_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        period,
        TRIM(UNNEST(STRING_TO_ARRAY(
            REGEXP_REPLACE(feedback, '[^a-zA-Z\s]', ' ', 'g'), ' '
        ))) as word
    FROM positive_feedback
    WHERE period IS NOT NULL
),
filtered_words AS (
    SELECT period, word
    FROM word_counts
    WHERE LENGTH(word) > 3
    AND word NOT IN ('the', 'and', 'was', 'that', 'this', 'with', 'have', 'from', 'were', 'they', 'been', 'their', 'what', 'when', 'your', 'said', 'each', 'which', 'them', 'than', 'many', 'some', 'time', 'very', 'about', 'other', 'into', 'more', 'these', 'would', 'there', 'make', 'just', 'over', 'also', 'back', 'after', 'only', 'year', 'work', 'three', 'being', 'never', 'those', 'both', 'great', 'good', 'food', 'place', 'nice', 'love', 'really', 'always', 'best', 'like')
)
SELECT 
    period,
    word as keyword,
    COUNT(*) as frequency
FROM filtered_words
GROUP BY period, word
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
ORDER BY period, frequency DESC
LIMIT 30;

-- Query 3: Top Keywords (Negative)
WITH negative_feedback AS (
    SELECT 
        LOWER(s.feedback) as feedback,
        CASE 
            WHEN (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date THEN 'This Week'
            WHEN (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date THEN 'This Month'
        END as period
    FROM surveys s
    WHERE s.rating <= 2
    AND s.feedback IS NOT NULL 
    AND LENGTH(s.feedback) > 10
    AND (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date
),
word_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        period,
        TRIM(UNNEST(STRING_TO_ARRAY(
            REGEXP_REPLACE(feedback, '[^a-zA-Z\s]', ' ', 'g'), ' '
        ))) as word
    FROM negative_feedback
    WHERE period IS NOT NULL
),
filtered_words AS (
    SELECT period, word
    FROM word_counts
    WHERE LENGTH(word) > 3
    AND word NOT IN ('the', 'and', 'was', 'that', 'this', 'with', 'have', 'from', 'were', 'they', 'been', 'their', 'what', 'when', 'your', 'said', 'each', 'which', 'them', 'than', 'many', 'some', 'time', 'very', 'about', 'other', 'into', 'more', 'these', 'would', 'there', 'make', 'just', 'over', 'also', 'back', 'after', 'only', 'year', 'work', 'three', 'being', 'never', 'those', 'both', 'didnt', 'dont', 'wasnt', 'werent', 'couldnt', 'wouldnt')
)
SELECT 
    period,
    word as keyword,
    COUNT(*) as frequency
FROM filtered_words
GROUP BY period, word
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
ORDER BY period, frequency DESC
LIMIT 30;

-- Query 4: Location Performance
WITH location_metrics AS (
    SELECT 
        l.id,
        l.name as location_name,
        l.city,
        l.state,
        COUNT(s.id) as total_surveys,
        AVG(s.rating) as avg_rating,
        COUNT(s.id) FILTER (WHERE s.rating <= 2) as negative_count,
        COUNT(s.id) FILTER (WHERE s.is_negative = true AND s.has_response = true) as negative_responded
    FROM locations l
    LEFT JOIN surveys s ON l.id = s.location_id 
        AND (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date
    WHERE l.disabled = false
    GROUP BY l.id, l.name, l.city, l.state
)
SELECT 
    location_name,
    city || ', ' || state as location,
    total_surveys,
    ROUND(avg_rating::numeric, 2) as avg_rating,
    ROUND(100.0 * negative_responded / NULLIF(negative_count, 0), 1) as negative_response_rate
FROM location_metrics
WHERE total_surveys > 0
ORDER BY avg_rating DESC NULLS LAST;

-- Query 5: Recent Negative Feedback
SELECT 
    l.name as location_name,
    c.name as customer_name,
    c.email as customer_email,
    c.phone as customer_phone,
    s.rating,
    s.feedback,
    s.response_message,
    s.response_by,
    s.has_response,
    DATE_PART('day', (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') - (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')) as days_ago,
    co.total as order_total,
    co.type as order_type
FROM surveys s
LEFT JOIN locations l ON s.location_id = l.id
LEFT JOIN customers c ON s.customer_id = c.id
LEFT JOIN customer_orders co ON co.customer_id = s.customer_id 
    AND DATE(co.order_placed_date AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') = DATE(s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')
WHERE s.rating <= 2
AND (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= (CURRENT_DATE AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') - INTERVAL '7 days'
AND s.feedback IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY s.created_at DESC
LIMIT 10;

-- Query 6: Team Performance
SELECT 
    COALESCE(s.response_by, 'Unassigned') as responder,
    COUNT(*) as responses_handled,
    AVG(s.response_time) as avg_response_time_minutes,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE s.response_time <= 60) as responses_under_1hr,
    ROUND(AVG(s.rating) FILTER (WHERE s.has_response = true)::numeric, 2) as avg_rating_after_response
FROM surveys s
WHERE s.has_response = true
AND (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date
GROUP BY s.response_by
ORDER BY responses_handled DESC;

-- Query 7: Daily Trends
SELECT 
    DATE(s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') as date,
    COUNT(*) as daily_surveys,
    ROUND(AVG(s.rating)::numeric, 2) as daily_avg
FROM surveys s
WHERE s.rating IS NOT NULL
AND (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= (CURRENT_DATE AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') - INTERVAL '30 days'
GROUP BY DATE(s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 30;

-- Query 8: Executive Summary
WITH metrics AS (
    SELECT
        COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date) as surveys_this_month,
        AVG(s.rating) FILTER (WHERE (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date) as avg_rating_month,
        COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE s.rating >= 4 AND (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date) as promoters,
        COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE s.rating <= 2 AND (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date) as detractors,
        AVG(s.rating) FILTER (WHERE (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') - INTERVAL '1 month')::date 
                              AND (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date < DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date) as avg_rating_last_month,
        COUNT(DISTINCT s.location_id) FILTER (WHERE (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date) as active_locations,
        COUNT(DISTINCT s.customer_id) FILTER (WHERE (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date) as unique_customers
    FROM surveys s
    WHERE s.rating IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT 
    surveys_this_month,
    ROUND(avg_rating_month::numeric, 2) as avg_rating,
    ROUND(100.0 * promoters / NULLIF(surveys_this_month, 0), 1) as promoter_percentage,
    ROUND(100.0 * detractors / NULLIF(surveys_this_month, 0), 1) as detractor_percentage,
    ROUND(100.0 * (promoters - detractors) / NULLIF(surveys_this_month, 0), 1) as nps_score,
    ROUND((avg_rating_month - avg_rating_last_month)::numeric, 2) as mom_change,
    CASE 
        WHEN avg_rating_month > avg_rating_last_month THEN 'üìà Improving'
        WHEN avg_rating_month < avg_rating_last_month THEN 'üìâ Declining'
        ELSE '‚û°Ô∏è Stable'
    END as trend,
    active_locations,
    unique_customers
FROM metrics;

-- Query 10: Hourly Pattern
WITH hourly_stats AS (
    SELECT 
        EXTRACT(HOUR FROM s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') as hour_of_day,
        COUNT(*) as survey_count,
        AVG(s.rating) as avg_rating
    FROM surveys s
    WHERE (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= (CURRENT_DATE AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') - INTERVAL '30 days'
    GROUP BY EXTRACT(HOUR FROM s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')
)
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN hour_of_day = 0 THEN '12 AM'
        WHEN hour_of_day < 12 THEN hour_of_day || ' AM'
        WHEN hour_of_day = 12 THEN '12 PM'
        ELSE (hour_of_day - 12) || ' PM'
    END as time_of_day,
    survey_count,
    ROUND(avg_rating::numeric, 2) as avg_rating
FROM hourly_stats
ORDER BY hour_of_day;

-- Query 11: Weekly Performance
WITH weekly_metrics AS (
    SELECT 
        DATE_TRUNC('week', s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date as week_start,
        TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('week', s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date, 'Mon DD') || ' - ' || 
        TO_CHAR((DATE_TRUNC('week', s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') + INTERVAL '6 days')::date, 'Mon DD') as week_label,
        COUNT(*) as total_surveys,
        AVG(s.rating) as avg_rating,
        COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE s.rating >= 4) as promoters,
        COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE s.rating <= 2) as detractors,
        COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE s.has_response = true) as responses_sent
    FROM surveys s
    WHERE (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= 
          DATE_TRUNC('week', (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') - INTERVAL '8 weeks')::date
    GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('week', s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date
)
SELECT 
    week_label,
    total_surveys,
    ROUND(avg_rating::numeric, 2) as avg_rating,
    ROUND(100.0 * (promoters - detractors) / NULLIF(total_surveys, 0), 1) as weekly_nps,
    ROUND(100.0 * responses_sent / NULLIF(total_surveys, 0), 1) as response_rate,
    ROUND((avg_rating - LAG(avg_rating) OVER (ORDER BY week_start))::numeric, 2) as wow_rating_change
FROM weekly_metrics
ORDER BY week_start DESC
LIMIT 8;

-- Query 12: Day of Week Performance
WITH day_stats AS (
    SELECT 
        TO_CHAR(s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago', 'Dy') as day_name,
        EXTRACT(DOW FROM s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') as day_number,
        COUNT(*) as survey_count,
        AVG(s.rating) as avg_rating
    FROM surveys s
    WHERE (s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')::date >= (CURRENT_DATE AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago') - INTERVAL '30 days'
    GROUP BY TO_CHAR(s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago', 'Dy'), 
             EXTRACT(DOW FROM s.created_at AT TIME ZONE 'America/Chicago')
)
SELECT 
    CASE day_number
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Sunday'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Monday'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Tuesday'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Wednesday'
        WHEN 4 THEN 'Thursday'
        WHEN 5 THEN 'Friday'
        WHEN 6 THEN 'Saturday'
    END as day_of_week,
    survey_count,
    ROUND(avg_rating::numeric, 2) as avg_rating
FROM day_stats
ORDER BY 
    CASE day_number
        WHEN 1 THEN 1
        WHEN 2 THEN 2
        WHEN 3 THEN 3
        WHEN 4 THEN 4
        WHEN 5 THEN 5
        WHEN 6 THEN 6
        WHEN 0 THEN 7
    END;
